definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A white or gray mineral of potassium aluminum silicate kalsi2o6.
sentences.chinese: 白榴石一种白色或灰色的钾铝矽酸盐矿物。

sentences.chinese: 白榴石一种白色或灰色的钾铝硅酸盐矿物。

definition: mafic rock (containing magnesium and iron, so comparatively heavy, making oceanic plates)
basic rock/mafic rock (with less silicon and more magnesium, iron etc)
orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system
